author: Boris Veldhuijzen van Zanten
title: As a CEO I’m often wrong — but that’s okay
description: Boris is the wise ol’ CEO of TNW who writes a weekly column on everything about being an entrepreneur in tech — from managing stress to embracing awkwardness. You can get his musings straight to your inbox by signing up for his newsletter! Every now and again…
content:
